sentences.en: A device or substance gas, used to incapacitate riot control.
sentences.cn: 用化学物质杀死 、 伤害或使敌人无力的战争.
使人失去活动能力的伤

sentences.en: Her mother has been incapacitated by a fall.
sentences.cn: 她母亲摔了一跤后，失去了正常生活能力。

sentences.en: His poor health incapacitate him for work.
sentences.cn: 他健康不佳使他不能工作.

sentences.en: Poor eyesight will incapacitate you for a job in the library.
sentences.cn: 视力差将使你不适合于在图书馆工作.

words.tran_cn: 不能的；无能力的；不能胜任的
无能力；无资格；不能胜任
丧失能力，欠缺行为能力（incapacitate的过去分词）
使无能力；使不能；使不适于

trans.tran_cn: 使无能力， 使不适合
trans.tran_en: to make you too ill or weak to live and work normally
to make you too ill or weak to live and work normally
